p: Collectively, the functionalization of the OH moiety with an unsubstituted benzyloxy group ( 15) or a linear alkyloxy chain ( 9) was preferred in eliciting the inhibitory activity below 100 Î¼M. The substitution of the benzyl ring with NO 2, F, and CN led to a reduction of the biological effect as well as the poly-substitution ( 26 and 30). The change of the benzyl group with a phthalimide ( 39) was detrimental. Interestingly, compound 38 with a 4-Ph on the benzyl ring exerted a comparable activity with respect to the parent compound.
